languages.text: "Я буду смиренно ждать, пока вы не направите свой корабль в сторону Даргонуса. Меркатум Табула Официале... Ах, звучит почти так же величественно, как {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Торговый Патент{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: "И буду смиренно ждать, пока вы не направите свой корабль в сторону Даргонуса. Меркатум Табула Официале... Ах, звучит почти так же величественно, как {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Торговый Патент{/g}!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "I will humbly wait until you steer your vessel toward Dargonus! The Mercatum Tabula Officiale... It sounds almost as majestic as the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}!"
languages.original_text: "Я буду смиренно ждать, пока вы не направите свой корабль в сторону Даргонуса. Меркатум Табула Официале... Ах, звучит почти так же величественно, как {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Торговый Патент{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: "And I will humbly wait until you steer your vessel toward Dargonus! The Mercatum Tabula Officiale... It sounds almost as majestic as the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: "I will humbly wait until you steer your vessel toward Dargonus! The Mercatum Tabula Officiale... It sounds almost as majestic as the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我会谦卑地等待着，直到你的舰船驶向达戈努斯！帝国官方行商执照……这听起来简直就像{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}贸易授状{/g}一样庄严！”
languages.original_text: "I will humbly wait until you steer your vessel toward Dargonus! The Mercatum Tabula Officiale... It sounds almost as majestic as the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: “而我会谦卑地等待着，直到你的舰船驶向达戈努斯！帝国官方行商执照……这听起来简直就像{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}贸易许可证{/g}一样庄严！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Esperaré con humildad hasta que dirija su nave a Dargonus! La Mercatum Tabula Officiale... ¡Suena casi tan majestuosa como la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente de Comercio{/g}!».
languages.original_text: "I will humbly wait until you steer your vessel toward Dargonus! The Mercatum Tabula Officiale... It sounds almost as majestic as the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Y yo esperaré con humildad hasta que dirija su nave a Dargonus! La Mercatum Tabula Officiale... ¡Suena casi tan majestuosa como la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente de Comercio{/g}!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「陛下がダルゴナスに船の舵を切るまではおとなしくしておくわ！メルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャル…{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}通商許可証{/g}並に立派な響きね！」
languages.original_text: "I will humbly wait until you steer your vessel toward Dargonus! The Mercatum Tabula Officiale... It sounds almost as majestic as the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下がダルゴナスに船の舵を切るまではおとなしくしておくわ！メルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャル…{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}通商許可証{/g}並に立派な響きね！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « J'attendrai patiemment que vous décidiez de mettre le cap sur Dargonus ! La Mercatum Tabula Officiale... Voilà qui en impose presque autant que la sacro-sainte {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} ! »
languages.original_text: "I will humbly wait until you steer your vessel toward Dargonus! The Mercatum Tabula Officiale... It sounds almost as majestic as the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: « De mon côté, j'attendrai patiemment que vous mettiez le cap sur Dargonus ! La Mercatum Tabula Officiale... Voilà qui en impose presque autant que la sacro-sainte {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich werde demütig warten, bis Ihr Euer Schiff nach Dargonus steuert! Die Mercatum Tabula Officiale ... Das klingt ja fast so majestätisch wie der {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g}!"
languages.original_text: "I will humbly wait until you steer your vessel toward Dargonus! The Mercatum Tabula Officiale... It sounds almost as majestic as the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: "Und ich werde demütig warten, bis Ihr Euer Schiff nach Dargonus steuert! Die Mercatum Tabula Officiale ... Das klingt ja fast so majestätisch wie der {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g}!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Tüm mütevazılığımla gemini Dargonus'a yöneltene kadar bekleyeceğim! Mercatum Tabula Officiale... Kulağa neredeyse {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ticari Ruhsatname{/g} kadar heybetli geliyor."
languages.original_text: "I will humbly wait until you steer your vessel toward Dargonus! The Mercatum Tabula Officiale... It sounds almost as majestic as the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g}!"
